changeSet.author: system
changeSet.sql:
-- Sample appointments for first 8 surveyors INSERT INTO surveyor_availability (surveyor_id, start_time, end_time, state, source) VALUES (1, DATEADD('DAY', 1, DATEADD('HOUR', 9, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), DATEADD('DAY', 1, DATEADD('HOUR', 11, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), 'BUSY', 'CMX'), (1, DATEADD('DAY', 1, DATEADD('HOUR', 14, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), DATEADD('DAY', 1, DATEADD('HOUR', 16, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), 'BUSY', 'CMX'), (1, DATEADD('DAY', 3, DATEADD('HOUR', 18, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), DATEADD('DAY', 3, DATEADD('HOUR', 20, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), 'BUSY', 'CMX'), (1, DATEADD('DAY', 5, DATEADD('HOUR', 11, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), DATEADD('DAY', 5, DATEADD('HOUR', 13, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), 'BUSY', 'CMX'), (1, DATEADD('DAY', 7, DATEADD('HOUR', 8, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), DATEADD('DAY', 7, DATEADD('HOUR', 12, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), 'OFFLINE', 'CMX'), (1, DATEADD('DAY', 9, DATEADD('HOUR', 15, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), DATEADD('DAY', 9, DATEADD('HOUR', 18, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), 'BUSY', 'CMX'),
(2, DATEADD('DAY', 1, DATEADD('HOUR', 10, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), DATEADD('DAY', 1, DATEADD('HOUR', 12, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), 'BUSY', 'CMX'), (2, DATEADD('DAY', 2, DATEADD('HOUR', 17, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), DATEADD('DAY', 2, DATEADD('HOUR', 19, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), 'BUSY', 'CMX'), (2, DATEADD('DAY', 4, DATEADD('HOUR', 8, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), DATEADD('DAY', 4, DATEADD('HOUR', 11, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), 'BUSY', 'CMX'), (2, DATEADD('DAY', 6, DATEADD('HOUR', 19, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), DATEADD('DAY', 6, DATEADD('HOUR', 21, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), 'BUSY', 'CMX'), (2, DATEADD('DAY', 8, DATEADD('HOUR', 8, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), DATEADD('DAY', 8, DATEADD('HOUR', 17, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), 'OFFLINE', 'CMX'),
(3, DATEADD('DAY', 1, DATEADD('HOUR', 12, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), DATEADD('DAY', 1, DATEADD('HOUR', 14, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), 'BUSY', 'CMX'), (3, DATEADD('DAY', 2, DATEADD('HOUR', 18, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), DATEADD('DAY', 2, DATEADD('HOUR', 21, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), 'BUSY', 'CMX'), (3, DATEADD('DAY', 9, DATEADD('HOUR', 8, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), DATEADD('DAY', 9, DATEADD('HOUR', 17, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), 'OFFLINE', 'CMX'),
(4, DATEADD('DAY', 1, DATEADD('HOUR', 17, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), DATEADD('DAY', 1, DATEADD('HOUR', 19, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), 'BUSY', 'CMX'), (4, DATEADD('DAY', 3, DATEADD('HOUR', 9, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), DATEADD('DAY', 3, DATEADD('HOUR', 12, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), 'BUSY', 'CMX'), (4, DATEADD('DAY', 6, DATEADD('HOUR', 8, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), DATEADD('DAY', 6, DATEADD('HOUR', 17, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), 'OFFLINE', 'CMX'),
(5, DATEADD('DAY', 1, DATEADD('HOUR', 8, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), DATEADD('DAY', 1, DATEADD('HOUR', 11, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), 'BUSY', 'CMX'), (5, DATEADD('DAY', 2, DATEADD('HOUR', 16, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), DATEADD('DAY', 2, DATEADD('HOUR', 18, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), 'BUSY', 'CMX'), (5, DATEADD('DAY', 7, DATEADD('HOUR', 8, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), DATEADD('DAY', 7, DATEADD('HOUR', 17, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), 'OFFLINE', 'CMX'),
(6, DATEADD('DAY', 1, DATEADD('HOUR', 14, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), DATEADD('DAY', 1, DATEADD('HOUR', 17, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), 'BUSY', 'CMX'), (6, DATEADD('DAY', 2, DATEADD('HOUR', 19, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), DATEADD('DAY', 2, DATEADD('HOUR', 21, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), 'BUSY', 'CMX'), (6, DATEADD('DAY', 10, DATEADD('HOUR', 8, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), DATEADD('DAY', 10, DATEADD('HOUR', 17, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), 'OFFLINE', 'CMX'),
(7, DATEADD('DAY', 1, DATEADD('HOUR', 18, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), DATEADD('DAY', 1, DATEADD('HOUR', 21, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), 'BUSY', 'CMX'), (7, DATEADD('DAY', 3, DATEADD('HOUR', 8, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), DATEADD('DAY', 3, DATEADD('HOUR', 11, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), 'BUSY', 'CMX'), (7, DATEADD('DAY', 11, DATEADD('HOUR', 8, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), DATEADD('DAY', 11, DATEADD('HOUR', 17, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), 'OFFLINE', 'CMX'),
(8, DATEADD('DAY', 1, DATEADD('HOUR', 9, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), DATEADD('DAY', 1, DATEADD('HOUR', 11, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), 'BUSY', 'CMX'), (8, DATEADD('DAY', 2, DATEADD('HOUR', 18, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), DATEADD('DAY', 2, DATEADD('HOUR', 21, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), 'BUSY', 'CMX'), (8, DATEADD('DAY', 10, DATEADD('HOUR', 8, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), DATEADD('DAY', 10, DATEADD('HOUR', 17, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)), 'OFFLINE', 'CMX');
